name: bedpostx_mgh
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: A modified version of FSL's bedpostx compatible with PBS queueing system for parallel computation.

inputs.name: Subject Directory
inputs.description: Subject directory containing necessary files such as bvals, bvecs, data, and nodif_brain_mask.

inputs.name: Number of Fibres
inputs.description: Number of fibres per voxel, default is 3

inputs.name: ARD Weight
inputs.description: ARD weight, more weight means fewer secondary fibres per voxel, default is 1

inputs.name: Sample Every
inputs.description: Sample every n steps, default is 25

inputs.name: Deconvolution Model
inputs.description: Deconvolution model selection. 1: with sticks, 2: with sticks with a range of diffusivities (default), 3: with zeppelins

inputs.name: Gradient Nonlinearities
inputs.description: Consider gradient nonlinearities, default is off
